topic_name: The Global Carbon Cycle in a Changing Climate
topic_description: Humans have increased the amount of CO<sub>2</sub> in our atmosphere; that, at least, everyone agrees on. What is less widely acknowledged are the many ways that CO<sub>2</sub> affects our planet. From acidifying oceans destroying coral reefs to 'heat stress' in plants causing drought (and don't forget global warming), the global carbon cycle is worth understanding.
